attributes.action: Increase tax on alcohol and use the proceeds to improve the N.H.S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The abuse of alcohol is responsible for plenty of misery and deaths.
A fortune is wasted daily in police time ,prison accomodation and N.H.S.resources. Those who abuse alcohol should pay for the consequences

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
